description: IFJAD, the Institute for Food Justice and Development, is a nonprofit organization based in Kiserian, Kenya. IFJAD aims to empower food workers, including farmers and fishermen, by providing education on food and financial literacy. The initiative aims to empower food workers, raise awareness about food injustices, and improve the quality of meals in public hospitals. Through collaboration and community engagement, IFJAD seeks to create a just and sustainable food environment for all.
name: Institute for Food Justice and Development
